attributes.action: Ensure all private rented accomodation conforms to environmentally friendly standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is well known that private landlords are not regulated in order to conform to environmentally friendly standards. To this end, we would like to force private landlords to provide the basics in order to combat greenhouse gas emissions by ensuring that all houses have the following:

Central Heating
Double Glazing
Full loft insulation

Prior to allowing a house to be put on the market for rent.
